nodes.description: 2019年4月29日，伊斯兰国（ISIS）发布视频，声称展示其领导人阿卜杜拉·阿卜杜拉·巴格达迪接受该组织媒体Al-Furqan采访
nodes.support_text: This image made from video posted April 29, 2019, on a militant website purports to show the leader of Islamic State, Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi, being interviewed by his group's Al-Furqan media outlet.

nodes.description: 2023年9月，美国在叙利亚伊德利卜省发动突袭，击毙阿卜杜拉·巴格达迪的弟弟阿卜杜拉·哈马扎
nodes.support_text: Al-Baghdadi's aide, a Saudi, was killed hours after the raid, also in northwestern Syria, in a U.S. strike.

nodes.description: 2023年10月，土耳其在阿勒颇省阿扎镇逮捕65岁的阿卜杜拉·巴格达迪姐姐拉希米亚·阿沃德，其丈夫、女儿及5名子女同行
nodes.support_text: The Turkish official said the 65-year-old known as Rasmiya Awad is suspected of being affiliated with the extremist group. He did not elaborate. Awad was captured in a raid Monday evening on a trailer container she was living in with her family near the town of Azaz in Aleppo province.

nodes.description: 2023年10月，美国突袭导致阿卜杜拉·巴格达迪助手（沙特籍）在叙利亚西北部死亡
nodes.support_text: Al-Baghdadi's aide, a Saudi, was killed hours after the raid, also in northwestern Syria, in a U.S. strike.

nodes.description: 2023年10月，ISIS宣布巴格达迪继任者，但继任者身份及组织架构变化细节未公开
nodes.support_text: The group named a successor to al-Baghdadi days later, but little is known about him or how the group's structure has been affected by the successive blows.

nodes.description: 2023年9月，巴格达迪在伊德利卜省被美军击毙，成为ISIS领土收缩后的关键转折点
nodes.support_text: Al-Baghdadi, an Iraqi from Samarra, was killed in a U.S. raid in the nearby province of Idlib last month. The raid was a major blow to the group, which has lost territories it held in Syria and Iraq in a series of military defeats by the U.S.-led coalition and Syrian and Iraqi allies.

nodes.description: 高级土耳其官员将逮捕行动称为情报的'金矿'
nodes.support_text: 高级土耳其官员将逮捕行动称为情报的'金矿'

nodes.description: 土耳其在阿勒颇省阿扎镇对阿卜杜拉·巴格达迪姐姐实施突袭并逮捕
nodes.support_text: 2023年10月，土耳其在阿勒颇省阿扎镇逮捕65岁的阿卜杜拉·巴格达迪姐姐拉希米亚·阿沃德，其丈夫、女儿及5名子女同行

nodes.description: 土耳其对相关地区实施军事管理
土耳其对IS分子和库尔德战士实施驱赶行动
nodes.support_text: 土耳其驱赶IS分子和库尔德战士

nodes.description: 盟友叙利亚集团对地区实施管理
nodes.support_text: 盟友叙利亚集团管理该地区

nodes.description: IS成员通过走私路线逃往叙利亚西北部
nodes.support_text: IS members escape via smuggling routes to northwestern Syria

nodes.description: 其他成员躲入叙利亚或伊拉克的沙漠
nodes.support_text: Other members hide in deserts of Syria or Iraq

edges.support_text: This image made from video posted April 29, 2019, on a militant website purports to show the leader of Islamic State, Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi, being interviewed by his group's Al-Furqan media outlet.
根据语义描述中事件发生时间与node_3的2023年10月逮捕行动存在逻辑关联
The group named a successor to al-Baghdadi days later, but little is known about him or how the group's structure has been affected by the successive blows.

The Turkish official said the 65-year-old known as Rasmiya Awad is suspected of being affiliated with the extremist group. He did not elaborate. Awad was captured in a raid Monday evening on a trailer container she was living in with her family near the town of Azaz in Aleppo province.
Al-Baghdadi's aide, a Saudi, was killed hours after the raid, also in northwestern Syria, in a U.S. strike.

Al-Baghdadi, an Iraqi from Samarra, was killed in a U.S. raid in the nearby province of Idlib last month. The raid was a major blow to the group, which has lost territories it held in Syria and Iraq in a series of military defeats by the U.S.-led coalition and Syrian and Iraqi allies.
巴格达迪被美军击毙后，土耳其于2023年10月实施相关行动
突袭逮捕后土耳其开始对地区实施管理
管理期间对IS分子和库尔德战士实施驱赶
驱赶行动后盟友叙利亚集团接手管理
根据temporal_order字段，escape事件（order 1）应早于melt事件（order 2）
